Welcome to the URFX FAQ section. Here, w: Welcome to the URFX FAQ section. Here, weâ€™ve compiled answers to the most common questions about our platform, trading rules, and account management.
URFX is a proprietary trading firm that: URFX is a proprietary trading firm that empowers skilled traders by providing them with the capital and resources needed to trade effectively. We offer various funding options and support to help traders succeed in the financial markets.
How do I become a funded trader with URF: How do I become a funded trader with URFX?
To become a funded trader with URFX, you: To become a funded trader with URFX, you need to successfully complete our evaluation process, which assesses your trading skills and risk management abilities. Upon passing, youâ€™ll receive a funded account to trade with.
What are the account sizes available?: What are the account sizes available?
We offer multiple account sizes to cater: We offer multiple account sizes to cater to different trading preferences. Specific details about each account size and their respective requirements can be found on our Programs page.
Is there a fee to participate in the eva: Is there a fee to participate in the evaluation?
Yes, there is a one-time fee to particip: Yes, there is a one-time fee to participate in our evaluation process. This fee covers the administrative costs of assessing your trading performance and is fully refundable upon achieving specific milestones in your funded account.
What platforms can I use to trade?: What platforms can I use to trade?
URFX supports trading on popular platfor: URFX supports trading on popular platforms such as MetaTrader 4 (MT4) and MetaTrader 5 (MT5), available on desktop, web, and mobile versions for your convenience.
Can I use Expert Advisors (EAs) or autom: Can I use Expert Advisors (EAs) or automated trading strategies?
Yes, the use of Expert Advisors (EAs) an: Yes, the use of Expert Advisors (EAs) and automated trading strategies is permitted, provided they adhere to our trading rules and do not exploit platform inefficiencies.
Our traders receive a competitive profit: Our traders receive a competitive profit split, allowing them to retain a significant portion of the profits they generate. Detailed information on profit-sharing ratios is available on our Programs page.
Payouts are processed upon request. Trad: Payouts are processed upon request. Traders can request their share of profits through our dashboard, and payments are typically processed within a specified timeframe. More details can be found in our Payout Policy.
Traders are expected to adhere to our ri: Traders are expected to adhere to our risk management rules, including maximum daily loss limits and overall drawdown limits. Specific details are outlined in our Trading Rules section.
Can I hold trades overnight or over the: Can I hold trades overnight or over the weekend?
Yes, traders are allowed to hold positio: Yes, traders are allowed to hold positions overnight and over weekends. However, itâ€™s essential to be aware of potential market gaps and increased volatility during these periods.
Yes, trading during news events is permi: Yes, trading during news events is permitted. Traders should exercise caution during high-impact news releases due to potential market volatility.
How is the daily loss limit calculated?: How is the daily loss limit calculated?
The daily loss limit is calculated based: The daily loss limit is calculated based on a percentage of your account balance or equity. Detailed calculations and examples are provided in our Risk Management Guidelines.
What happens if I violate a trading rule: What happens if I violate a trading rule?
Violating trading rules may result in th: Violating trading rules may result in the termination of your funded account. Itâ€™s crucial to familiarize yourself with all trading rules to maintain your account status.
Can I trade multiple accounts simultaneo: Can I trade multiple accounts simultaneously?
Yes, traders can manage multiple account: Yes, traders can manage multiple accounts, provided they comply with our account management policies. Specific guidelines are available in our Multiple Accounts Policy.
Are there any restrictions on trading in: Are there any restrictions on trading instruments?
Traders have access to a wide range of i: Traders have access to a wide range of instruments, including forex pairs, commodities, indices, and cryptocurrencies. A comprehensive list is available on our Trading Instruments page.
How do I request a payout?: How do I request a payout?
Payouts can be requested through the tra: Payouts can be requested through the trader dashboard. Detailed instructions are provided in our Payout Request Guide.
How can I track my trading performance?: How can I track my trading performance?
Our trader dashboard provides comprehens: Our trader dashboard provides comprehensive analytics and performance metrics to help you monitor and improve your trading strategies.
Is there a minimum trading day requireme: Is there a minimum trading day requirement?
Yes, traders are required to trade a min: Yes, traders are required to trade a minimum number of days during the evaluation phase. Specific details are outlined in our Evaluation Guidelines.
How do I get started with URFX?: How do I get started with URFX?
To get started, visit our Sign-Up Page,: To get started, visit our Sign-Up Page, choose your preferred evaluation program, and follow the registration process. Our support team is available to assist you throughout your journey with URFX.
